snippet: Tom Pernice Jr. moved into position for his second Champions Tour title, shooting a seven-under-par 65 to take a two-stroke lead over Tom Kite in Blaine, Minn.
abstract: Tom Pernice Jr takes second-round lead at 3M Championship golf tournament in Blaine, Minn.
lead_paragraph: Tom Pernice Jr. moved into position for his second Champions Tour title, shooting a seven-under-par 65 to take a two-stroke lead over Tom Kite in Blaine, Minn.

headline.main: Pernice Has Two-Shot Lead Over Kite in 3M Championship
headline.print_headline: Pernice Has a Two-Shot Lead Over Kite
